This is a pokemon description. English name is Kingdra. Japanese name is Kingdra. Primary type is water. Secondary type is dragon. Classification is Dragon Pokémon. Height m is 1.8. And there are always more to catch— many people release them into lakes illicitly.

This is a pokemon description. English name is Lampent. Japanese name is Lampler. Primary type is ghost. Secondary type is fire. Classification is Lamp Pokémon. Height m is 0.6. Weight kg is 13.0.
